text: Weâ€™ve just imported 20k ticking time bombs from Afghanistan and we have homeless veterans getting arrested for begging in the street!
Surely people who also risked their lives to help our forces also need us to honour our promises?
Our own must always come first. We have at least 13k homeless ex-soldiers sleeping rough
We also have at least 1 million empty homes. There are many reasons for the housing shortage, but newly arrived Afghans is not one of them.
Our soldiers are left to rot on our streets while we house terrorists and child groomers
Neither of those statements is true. I saw scared kids and families coming off those planes from Kabul but you just want to bang on about â€˜time bombsâ€™. I think you have a different agenda.
Iâ€™m a patriot, I care about the future of our once great country.
Can I suggest that greatness can be found in caring, compassion and concern for others and that these are the values we need to make us â€˜greatâ€™ again.
Only 1 day more before the end of Black History Month. Only another year before this racist nonsense starts again!
Whatâ€™s racist about it?
It segregates people based on their colour.
Isnâ€™t it more about making visible whatâ€™s been largely invisible?
It should be called what it really isâ€¦Bad mouth whitesâ€™ month
I think the title is perfectâ€¦signifying a celebration of individual and collective achievements.
Itâ€™s fake and harmful racial hatred driven by people who profit from it.
I donâ€™t see expressions of hatred, but Iâ€™d agree there is a profit for us all in understanding a largely hidden part of our shared histories.
Thereâ€™s a rumour that Terry Gilliamâ€™s new production has been cancelled because the theatre is concerned about his anti-trans statements. More cancel culture madness!
Its only a rumour, and he has grown into a curmudgeon in his old age. ðŸ˜Š
Its dangerous censorship and an assault on free speech.
If the cancellation is true, then surely itâ€™s a theatre sticking by its principles and reminding us that rights also bring responsibilities.
What about freedom of expression in the arts?
But the rumoured cancellation is not related to the play he was planning.
We need to protect our right to cause offence.
But, he hasnâ€™t lost that right, just had a reminder that what we say affects how people view and treat us.
More migrants crossing the channel today. We donâ€™t have enough accommodation. Our own homeless are forgotten. Send them back.
Are you forgetting that last year every rough sleeper was offered a bed during lockdown?
During lockdown.
If thereâ€™s a will thereâ€™s a way.
We donâ€™t have enough accommodation.
Maybe, but to present migration as the sole cause of both homelessness and the shortage of affordable homes is nonsense.
Local Councils canâ€™t afford to house the homeless, but Surrey is to get its first rainbow public crossing painted in time for Pride.
Nice to see somewhere celebrating diversity and inclusivity.
Its political correctness gone mad!
Hardly, just a few layers of paint to mark Pride?
They need to get their priorities right. Virtue signalling do-gooders wasting taxpayersâ€™ money
I just read that Surrey had a Â£7.8 surplus at the end of the financial year, so surely enough spare to brighten things up for a celebration?
Iâ€™m sick of this bullshit being forced on us all.
Take heart, Pride, like Xmas, is but once a year.ðŸ™‚
I just read that the Home office is handing out mobile phones to migrant invaders so that they can progress their asylum claims â€¦ you couldnâ€™t make this up!
Yeah, I saw a blog post that mentioned this but just quoted a â€˜source in the Home officeâ€™, which is a bit dodgy.
We should be sinking the boats not handing out phones!
I donâ€™t think drowning desperate people is a solution.
Our traitor politicians are enabling invasion.
To be fair, there seems to be plenty of evidence of the contrary.
By handing out mobiles at the taxpayersâ€™ expense?

Iâ€™ve seen more about Border Force routinely confiscating phones to look for data about the trafficking gangsâ€¦which seems more likely to me. That, and the fact I keep seeing charities asking for donations of old phones for asylum seekers?
All credit to the Poles, they know how to control their borders. Bats and rubber bulletsâ€¦Iâ€™d happily volunteer!
Donâ€™t you think itâ€™s a pity that a country that suffered so much under totalitarianism now adopts the same tactics?
A proud country preventing an invasion.
By beating back people caught in a crisis not of their own making?
An army of potential terrorists and child molesters.
We must be watching different news channels. All I see are desperate people and frightened kids all seeking a safe haven.
social media is banging on about the MOBO Awards again. When will we see awards for Music of WHITE Origin?
Who would you nominate? Ed Sheeran? ðŸ™‚
We donâ€™t need to make everything about race.
Why not see it as a celebration of creativity and innovation?
Who really cares anyway?
A few...last year, the event live-stream had 430,000 viewers and the MOBO YouTube channel attracted 2.6 million views from December 7-15.
All of the 50 criminals due to be deported yesterday to Jamaica, were removed from a chartered flight after appeals by Human Rights Lawyers.
Surely, if the deportations were halted, these people had at the very least, grounds for appeal?
Its just a gravy train for leftie lawyers, all paid for by the tax payer. Foreigners shouldnâ€™t have access to legal aid.
You donâ€™t believe that people, regardless of any allegation, deserve a fair trial?
Itâ€™s a bloody disgrace that we canâ€™t get rid of foreign child molesters and rapists.

Whatever the criminal offence, these appeals are about the legality of the deportation, a complex area of law and hence why its one of the few grounds for entitlement to legal aid. Back to ensuring people get a fair trial.
The legal system isnâ€™t fit for purpose!
Iâ€™d probably agree with you there, but I canâ€™t support the idea that we are NOT all EQUAL in the eyes of the law.
These Muslim MPâ€™s should stop pretending they are British. Theyâ€™re not, they are just invaders!
Given most were born here, you seem to be saying that you canâ€™t be Muslim and Britishâ€¦which doesnâ€™t make sense
They need to stop using the Racism cardâ€¦its just meaningless anti-white bullshit used to guilt-trip whites! We are sick of it!
As a â€˜white personâ€™ I donâ€™t feel guilty, but Iâ€™m happy to call out racism and Islamophobia when I encounter it.
Islam isnâ€™t a raceâ€¦itâ€™s a death cult and incompatible with British society.
Iâ€™d suggest that racism and Islamophobia are contrary to British values of equality and religious freedom.
This is a Christian country.
Again, Iâ€™d disagree since my experience is of a multi-faith society. Besides, Iâ€™ve never voted based on the stated religion of a candidate.

Iâ€™ve just seen a video posted by a Patriot, of Muslim men of fighting age sleeping in a church because the asylum hotels are full. Free food, clothes and blanketsâ€¦they donâ€™t do that for our homeless!
Well, they do. Using churches as homeless shelters has become common in recent years, so Iâ€™d guess the church in question already had the experience to help these desperate people.
Its giving succour to the enemy!
Come on, its charity, what good Christians believe in.
Theyâ€™re muzzies, they should be in a mosque!
I doubt they had any choice about where they were put, and maybe there are no Mosques in the area. Iâ€™m sure that Mosques up and down the country are doing their part.
We should be sending they back not feeding and clothing them.
Have you not read the story of the Good Samaritan? Isnâ€™t this what Jesus would want from his flock?
Another County Cricket Club Chairman has resigned over â€˜historicâ€™ racist remarks from 4 years ago. This is becoming a witch hunt!
I donâ€™t think racism was any more acceptable 4 years ago, than it is today.
Who remembers what they said 4 years ago? End of cricket, the white man canâ€™t play anymore!
I think Iâ€™d remember an unacceptable and deeply offensive insult, regardless of how long ago, and of course white people can play cricket, they just need to learn not be racists.
This is about silencing the majority, so they donâ€™t complain about being replaced.
Nahâ€¦just about ensuring players can thrive and arenâ€™t insulted and abused just because of who they are.
We pick them up in the Channel, ferry them to Dover, house them in hotels, provide free food and an allowance. We welcome them, so no wonder they come.
They come because they are desperate. Would you risk the sea in an open boat for a free pizza and a flea-pit hotel?
We donâ€™t need them, and we canâ€™t even look after our own. We need to turn them back, not let them in.
What about the so-called â€˜proud traditionâ€™ of welcoming those fleeing for their lives and our commitment to the 1951 Refugee Convention, which we had a hand in drafting?
These are â€˜Economic migrantsâ€™ or worse. If they were asylum seekers, they would claim sanctuary in the nearest safe country.

Most do. Although, as you will now, The Convention does not require refugees to claim asylum in the first safe country they reach or make it illegal to seek asylum if a claimant has passed through another safe country.
The indigenous people of Britain are being replaced!

Thatâ€™s a different issued and while I disagree, I havenâ€™t got time to debate the notions of â€˜Britishnessâ€™ today. Letâ€™s just hope that there are no more tragedies due to the channel crossing. You take care and have a nice day.
How come these â€˜desperateâ€™ migrants all have mobiles, designer gear, trainers and can afford to pay thousands to people smugglers?

Some will have sold homes, businesses, possessions. Others will be supported by family networks, loans from dear friends. â€˜Desperateâ€™ doesnâ€™t always mean â€˜poorâ€™. Many will be professionals, civil servants, lawyers, teachers.
Rapists, terrorists, and child molesters!
Families, women, and children, as well as young men fleeing war, famine, persecution, and oppression...
Young men of fighting age, an invading army.

Fleeing war, forced conscription, religious and political persecution, fear. Ask yourself, how bad would things have to be, to leave your home, family and country and face the ordeal these people have subjected themselves to?
We are full, we donâ€™t need anymore migrants or asylum seekers.

Population density varies and this, along with other factors like a failure to build homes causes local shortages but to say we are â€˜fullâ€™ is not true or accurate. At the last count there were over 1 million empty properties in the UK.
So why are people homeless and sleeping on the streets?
Poverty, Eviction, relationship breakdown, substance abuse, mental health issues, unemployment, disability, PSD, failed asylum applicationsâ€¦itâ€™s a long list.
You agree that immigration is a contributor then?
Yes of course, but only a small factor amongst many. Ask yourself, if we had no immigration, would that solve the housing shortage on its own?
It might be a start.

Iâ€™d rather see more houses built, the empties let to tenants, adequate support for the homeless, the mentally ill and ex-service personnel, alongside the de-decriminalisation and support for people with addiction. That would be a better start.
All these asylum seekers coming here and taking jobs away from native brits, no wonder this country is in a mess.

Asylum seekers arenâ€™t actually allowed to work in the UK until they get refugee status, and often take jobs that native Brits donâ€™t want. Also, many people who migrate here start businesses, creating more jobs!
Theyâ€™ll do it for less than minimum wage though, so we donâ€™t get offered the jobs because theyâ€™ll do it for cheaper.
Thatâ€™s the fault of exploitative employers who donâ€™t want to pay their workers properly, not the refugees for trying to make a living.
Women getting into the labour market has caused the downfall of Western civilisation, they should be at home raising children. Abandoning traditional roles is the ruin of society.

Iâ€™d disagree, women should be able to choose what they do, but also even if some women did want to stay at home, many donâ€™t have a choice anymore! Itâ€™s impossible to support a family on 1 wage now.
Oh really? It didnâ€™t used to be impossible, it used to be the norm, whatâ€™s changed?

The cost of living has increased rapidly whilst wages have stagnated over the last few decades. This means that whilst 1 full time wage used to support a family, now with proportionately higher prices for things like food and housing, this isnâ€™t possible.
The trans agenda donâ€™t want mens and womens toilets, everything has to be â€˜all in 1â€™ now. Is this the future we want? Risking womens safety just so men in dresses feel comfortable?

In some bars and cafes that I usually go to there are gender neutral toilets, and I've never had a problem with them. As long as people respect others and respect the space, 'all in 1' toilets work fine.
But many wont and many will feel aggrieved by them. You choose to go to that bar/cafe but public toilets will obviously become a problem.

Yeah, it's bound to be unfamiliar to some people, but I'm just saying it can work without there being issues/conflict. It's a question of what the norm is. A lot of student unions and universities today have gender neutral toilets, so that generation will be generally okay with it.
Immigrants add to the cost of the NHS, get loads of money in benefits, and create a housing shortage. Time to close the borders.
They also pay taxes, contributing to the cost of these services, and are less likely than native Brits to claim benefits, as many are not entitled to it!
They still cost us a lot as a country, and if they're not on benefits it means there are less jobs for British people too
Immigrants are also more likely to be business owners, meaning they create jobs.
They probably only hire their own though
Are you annoyed that immigrants are getting benefits or that they're taking jobs? Make up your mind
Got on the train today and there's rainbow flag logos everywhere. Fed up of this LGBT stuff being shoved in our faces. When will this woke nonsense end?
If you consider supporting the LGBT+ community to be 'woke nonsense' then that sounds like your problem...
We just don't need to see it everywhere, even the trains are no longer free of it. This is the start of them spreading their agenda.

The LGBT+ community doesn't have an 'agenda' but public shows of support like this show people that homophobia and transphobia are unacceptable, and this might help some people feel safer in public spaces!
Soon it will be 'sexist' to even talk to birds, everyone gets offended so easily these days you can't say anything.
If you talk to women like they're people not 'birds' you shouldn't have a problem!
I'll call them what I want
Well, treating people with respect, like not using dehumanising or derogatory terms towards them, is usually a good idea if you want to be treated with respect back!
All these muslims coming over here want to enforce sharia law and take over. We cannot submit!!!
Muslims don't want to 'take over', even if they abide by sharia themselves, they're just trying to live alongside everybody else
There's so many of them though, they're trying to replace us
Only around 5% of the UK population are Muslim, non-Muslims are definitely not being replaced!
All muslims are terrorists!
That's not true, and it's a big generalisation, terrorists come from many backgrounds and religions, terrorism is not an exclusively Muslim issue
So you're saying there are no Muslim terrorists?? Wake up
No, there obviously are some terrorists who are Muslim, but the vast majority of Muslims are peaceful and are appalled by the actions of those who commit violent acts of extremism
Jews want to take over the world and decimate Western civilisation!
That's not true, where did you hear that?
Have you heard of the great replacement? You should look it up. Jews are using their power to ruin the West and replace white people.

The great replacement is a ridiculous conspiracy theory. Yes, there are some Jewish people in high powered positions but this doesn't mean these people are using their power to 'replace white people'.
Gay people need to live separately from us so we don't catch AIDS from them.

The HIV AIDS epidemic in the 80's was weaponised to spread homophobia and demonise gay people. Anybody can get HIV, straight or gay, and the vast majority of gay people do not have this illness. Those who do can manage their condition with daily medication, which makes it impossible to transmit.
It's a gay disease, straight people don't get AIDS

Yes they do, HIV which can develop into AIDS is actually more likely to be undiscovered in straight people, meaning there is more risk of it spreading. This is because after the epidemic the LGBT community became hyperaware of the risk, and generally get tested more.
If black people aren't all criminals, why are they disproportionately arrested and taking up space in our prisons?

Because of institutionalised racism in the Police, meaning they are more likely to get stopped and searched, randomly targeted, or assumed to be doing something 'suspicious'. Also because of the type of crimes the Police focus energy on e.g. street crimes that happen in poorer areas, which black people are more likely to live in, are given more Police attention than white collar crime.
You can't blame everything on 'institutional racism'

No, you can't, but it explains why more black people committing the same crimes that white people commit get caught. This is especially true for drug offenses, where white people are just as likely if not more likely to be in possession of drugs, but are way less likely to be searched.
More boats at Dover today, the migrant invasion continuesâ€¦
Itâ€™s not a planned â€˜invasionâ€™, theyâ€™re refugees fleeing to safety.
If theyâ€™re really â€˜refugeesâ€™ why didnâ€™t they stop in the first safe country they got to?

Some people come to the UK because they have family here, or speak English already, also not all countries that we consider â€˜safeâ€™ are safe for refugees, given the way theyâ€™re treated by the Police in some places.
SHARE if you think homeless veterans should be housed before any refugees!

Both veterans and refugees should be housed! There is enough housing for all however a lack of social and affordable housing means lots of places lie empty. Everyone deserves to have a roof over their head.
Veterans go to the bottom of the list like everybody else once they've left the barracks and army housing, we have to petition our own government to protect them.
Yes I agree! In a country with this much wealth there should be protection for all vulnerable people, veteran or refugee.
Why donâ€™t all these Muslim refugees go to other wonderful Muslim countries? Am I missing something?

Actually, Muslim countries like Turkey, Pakistan, and Jordan take more refugees than any other countries. The percentage of refugees that come to the UK is tiny in comparison to the full amount of displaced people from conflicts in Syria, Afghanistan, etc.
Why do we have so many coming here across the channel then? Weâ€™re full, thereâ€™s no room for them here.

The number of displaced people is very high right now, and just as other countries are doing, we need to take our fair share. I would argue we definitely have a responsibility, especially since the UK has played a part in some of the conflicts that displaced them.
How is it our fault if thereâ€™s a war in some third world country?
UK manufacturers profit from selling military equipment and weapons to these countries. The least we can do is help people who are fleeing violence there.
LGBT history month now being taught in schoolsâ€¦ Iâ€™m sick of this being shoved down our throats, what happened to British, European and World history being taught? Identity politics gone mad.

We still can teach British, European and World history, but part of that is looking at the history of groups which have been erased from our history previously. Looking at the some of the historic struggles of LGBT people in the UK can inform the future for everyone!

Do we have to discuss the sexuality of everyone in history when itâ€™s largely irrelevant? If they were persecuted for it then fair enough, stick it in there and say how wrong it was, otherwise leave well alone.

LGBT people have been persecuted until recently in the UK, and it's still illegal to be gay in over 70 countries. I think it's important that people see that there have always been LGBT people, throughout history and that LGBT identities are not 'new' or a 'trend', they're real.
Jews are so greedy, they're always thinking about money
That's a sweeping generalisation and an incorrect stereotype. You can't tar all Jewish people with the same brush! There's also a lot of 'greedy' people who aren't Jewish
I've never met a Jew who wasn't greedy
From the way you're talking, it sounds like you haven't met many Jewish people at all. Maybe you need to interact with more people who are different from you, to understand their perspectives.
Feminism gives women the muddled idea that women are free when they serve their employers but slaves when they help their husbands.
Nope, feminism is believing that a woman can go to work, have a husband, do both or neither, and all of those options are fine as long as it's what she wants to do.

Itâ€™s ok for who? For the long term of our civilisation? Groups that have more children, like Muslims, will grow and those who don't, like white women, will decline. Women need to be prioritising having a family.
Women don't owe you children, if they don't want to have them and want to prioritise other things instead they have a right to. Children are a big commitment.
But what about Western civilisation? If the white population doesn't reproduce we will become a minority.
You're really going to make this about race? It doesn't make a difference to me what ethnicity or religion the children of the future are, we are all human!
LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
Why do you feel like LGBT people are dangerous?
It's a slippery slope, first we accept gays and transgenders, next it will be pedophiles.
There is no link between the LGBT+ community and paedophiles. These things have no connection.
Are you saying there's no gay or trans paedophiles? Because that's a lie.

No, I'm saying paedophilia and child abuse is not an LGBT+ issue, paedophiles can be straight, gay, or whatever else. People in the LGBT+ community are not advocating for paedophilia to be accepted, that's a false and harmful conception.
Can't believe we are housing and feeding all these asylum seekers when they are coming over here ILLEGALLY
They have to come here to be able to claim asylum at all, you have to be on UK soil to make a claim. It's not illegal to go to a country to claim asylum.
Why do they come over hidden in lorries or in dinghies across the channel then? why not just get a flight?

That's much easier said than done, especially when you're coming from a country in a state of unrest, or you don't have all of your documentation because you had to flee. Sometimes these routes are the only way.
All muslims are rapists
That's a sweeping generalisation, and it's not true at all. Sexual assault happens in all communities, and is committed by people from all backgrounds and religions.
What about what happened in Rotherham and Rochdale? Grooming gangs are a big problem.

Yes, the abuse carried out by Muslim grooming gangs in those places was horrific and can't be ignored, but sexual assault is extremely common unfortuately, and is usually committed in the home, often by a partner, family member, or someone known to the victim. This means that the vast majority of sexual assaults are not committed by Muslims.
Do you have any evidence about that?
Yes, here's an article (link to article about sexual assault statistics)
Muslims want to invade us and enforce sharia law!
No, the vast majority of Muslims just want to be able to live their lives, they don't care if others follow sharia.
How do you explain the Taliban then?
Every religion has extremists, but the vast majority of Muslims condemn the actions of terrorist groups like the Taliban. They do not reflect Muslims as a whole.
As much as the media tries, you can't convince me to take transgenders seriously. A man can put on a dress and make up but at the end of the day they're still a man. That's basic biology.

It's not 'biology'. You're confusing sex and gender. Gender has nothing to do with our biology or body, it's about our identity and how we feel. Sex is our anatomy, hormones etc, but even this isn't as binary as many people beleive.
What do you mean sex isn't binary? There's men and there's women, nothing inbetween.

No, there are many people who don't fit into the sex binary, for example intersex people. Also people have different hormone levels, and reproductive organs. This shows things aren't as clear cut as there just being 2 sexes!
I tolerated fag pride, I tolerated seeing fags on tv, but I draw the line at schools teaching children about their perverted lifestyles. This is indoctrination.
Teaching about LGBT relationships in schools isn't trying to indoctrinate children, it's just teaching kids that gay relationships exist and can be healthy and happy.
I don't know if homosexual relationships are ever healthy or happy...
There are plenty of happy and healthy gay relationships, and it's important for children to see these normalised so they don't feel shame, or feel like they have to hide if they realise they are gay.
and what about all the straight kids? Having this rammed down their throats isn't good for them
It's important for them to be educated about LGBT relationships too so they don't become hateful and hostile. We should raise children to accept everybody for who they are.

If we accept transgenders it's a slippery slope. First you can identify as whatever gender you want, then it will be whatever age they want. Suddenly paedophilia is something we're being told to accept...
There's no link between transgender people and paedophilia. Paedophiles can be straight, gay, trans, or cisgender, it's not a trans issue.
It's perversion all the same. You must be able to see how allowing these freaks to have their way is harmful.
No, it's not harmful or perverted. Transgender people just want to be able to live their lives in a way they feel comfortable. It's not about 'perversion' or paedophilia.
It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
Why does it disgust you?
We need to keep the white race alive, polluting it by breeding with blacks means there will be less white children in the future.
Why do you care what colour children are? People are free to have children with whoever they want and it's quite authoritarian to say they shouldn't.

If you need any more proof that whites and blacks are not equal, look at the technological advancement achieved by each. Whites took us to space, Africans are still living in third world shitholes. We are not the same.
Actually, did you know some of the most essential work done at NASA to launch space exploration missions was done by a group of black female mathematicians?
No I didn't, sounds fake, is it true?
Yes, look up 'hidden figures', a film was recently made based on the true story of the mathematicians who were instrumental to some of the early NASA missions.
We are letting Muslim terrorists come to our country as 'refugees'. This has got to stop.
The people coming to our country as refugees are not terrorists, in a lot of cases they're fleeing terrorism
So you're saying none of them are terrorists? We know that's a lie, Muslim migrants commit crimes all the time.
Sure there might be a few people who have violent extremist views, but these people are not representative of the Muslim community in any way.
Blacks and civilisation are incompatible. You can have a thriving society or you can have diversity, you canâ€™t have both.
I have to disagree. Some of our brightest thinkers, visionaries, inventors, scientists etc are black people. It's ignorant to dismiss the black excellence that is so influential in our society.
Oh yeah, like who?
Martin Luther King, Angela Davis, Madam C. J. Walker, Maya Angelou... need I go on?
Iâ€™ve never met a happy gay person. Itâ€™s a miserable, perverted lifestyle. Those people need help.
I know plenty of happy people in the LGBT community, what can make people miserable is the homophobia they have to face!
People who take that route in life have mental issues, I doubt homophobia is the reason they're miserable since our society is so 'woke' now.
Your views about gay people are proof themselves that homophobia is still prevalent today. You don't have to understand other peoples identities, but respecting them costs nothing.
Ask yourself after millions of immigrants have entered the UK, many illegally

Equating all these things to immigration seems illogical. Lots of changes have happened in the last 30 years socially, culturally, economically. Surely these things have more to do with the governments that have presided in this time and the economy? Not just immigration?
So you feel safe with all these rapists and criminals out on our streets?

You canâ€™t assume all crime in the UK is because of immigrants. Sure, some immigrants commit crimes, but so do some British people, maybe crime rates are much more to do with poverty and people lacking opportunities in life, rather than nationality or race?

Pro-trans zealots view themselves as a virtuous and inclusive subset of "progressive modernisers". In reality, they are responsible for the growing social erasure of women. This cultural assault on women's rights is uncivilised and not to be tolerated.

As a woman myself, I can tell you that trans people having rights doesn't affect my rights one bit. I'd say a bigger threat to women's rights are things like low conviction rates for sexual assault, domestic violence, etc.

When their rights trump or override womenâ€™s hard won rights then it is a problem. When it affects women's safe spaces then itâ€™s a problem. Thereâ€™s evidence to show that abuse of these rights are happening.
Okay, what rights are they infringing on, and what evidence? Trans people donâ€™t want to cause problems for women, they just want to get on with their lives like anyone else.

Everywhere you look on tv now, white people are being erased. Every advert has mixed race families, openly promoting miscegenation, no white men anywhere. This is all part of their plan to decimate the white race.
There are so many white people on tv, if you think there isn't you're obviously not paying attention!
Thereâ€™s so many more black and Asian people on tv now, itâ€™s ridiculous, this is what theyâ€™re trying to make us think is â€˜normalâ€™.

Just because there is more representation of ethnic minorities doesnâ€™t mean thereâ€™s no white people, itâ€™s just more proportional now. Other people being represented doesnâ€™t mean white people are being â€˜erasedâ€™ or â€˜oppressedâ€™, it just means the industry is more representative of what society actually looks like.
Hundreds of Muslim men, all of fighting age, arriving in boats every day. This is what invasion looks like, we must be ready to fight back.
What does 'of fighting age' mean? They're not here to fight, they're here because they want a peaceful life and many are fleeing war, persecution, or hardship.
With the amount of them coming over they would have a lot of manpower if they came together to take over the country.
That's ridiculous though, people seeking asylum or migrating here aren't all conspiring together to 'take over', sounds like you've been reading one too many conspiracy theories...
The more diverse a community the less people volunteer, vote, give to charity, and trust each other. This is why blacks are incompatible with our civilisation.
Where is this from and is it generalisable at all?
I read it on an academic blog, the article makes some good points about the advantages of homogenous racial communities.

I'd encourage you to be critical of using blogs as sources for information, it could be biased or unreliable. Maybe the reason the article came to this conclusion is because more diverse communities are likely to be poorer because of economic inequalities faced by minorities?
Why would that make a difference?
Well maybe economic hardship is the reason why people in these communities volunteer, vote, and give less, because they don't have the time or resources to.
Just read an article that explained how the Jewish elite use their positions of power to control us!
Where did you read this article? Are you sure it's from a source you can trust?
It's from a website I get a lot of my news from, I would say it's pretty trustworthy.

Please read with a critical eye, you can't trust everything on the internet! This sounds like a source with an agenda, of course people in positions of power can exploit their status but the fact that the article suggests it's because they're Jewish makes me think the writer has an agenda. Maybe see if this story is being reported by any other sources too.
Just seen a story about a park in Manchester where Muslims are banning people from walking their dogs because it offends them!!! Trying to enforce sharia law, it's time we take our country back!!

This is actually fake news! There's a website which shows the posters put up in the park to 'ban' dog walking were put there by people trying to stir up hate against the Muslim community. Don't believe everything you read!
Are you sure? Sounds like something Muslims would do.

Yep, here's the source showing how it was planned. A good way to check if something is real in the future is to cross reference it with other news sites, to see if other sites with different perspectives have reported on the same stories.
Just seen an article exposing how the trans agenda is targeting children and trying to get them to become trannies! This is madness!
Where did you read this? Are you sure it's from a reliable source? This sounds like inflammatory fake news.
